item.title: Can Machines Build Enough Muscle?
item.description:
Can Machines Build Enough Muscle?

Let's settle this argument once and for all, right here and now: You can build muscle with either machines or free weights. Of course, this article can't end abruptly after one sentence. That's because there are some situations in which one type of equipment is a better choice.

item.title: Glute Training: A Woman's Secret to Looking Great
item.description:
Glute Training: A Woman's Secret to Looking Great

There were even fad training gimmicks looking like two ski poles. Those poles were fixed on the ground and would serve to help women do more lunges to develop those firm "buns and thighs" as the saying went in the '90s. Glute training always had a special appeal to women....
